    Tokyo Tech Academy for Super Smart Society
    cultivate super doctor leading future society, based on the fusion of society-collaborated education (open education) and interdisciplinary collaboration research (open innovation)

    Super Smart Society Global Forum

    2020/03/12
    Date：2020/3/12日 13:00~
    Please：S221-224, Ookayama Campus, TokyoTech
    A symposium with invited talks from the overseas advisors of WISE-SSS program is organized by SSS promotion consortium.

    Click for Details

    WISE-SSS kickoff ceremony

    2020/03/11
    Date：2020/3/11 13:00-20:00
    Place：Tokyo Tech Front
    Ookayama Campus, Tokyo Tech
    We will cultivate society-leading super-skill PhD holders capable of fusing cutting-edge quantum science and technologies in both cyber and physical space. The consortium officials and special advisors have been invited to hold the kick-off ceremony for the Tokyo Tech Academy for the Super Smart Society at the above date and time. Please join us.

    Click for Details

    2nd Orientation

    2020/02/05
    Date：2020/2/5 17:00-18:30
    Place：Lecture Theater W531
    Ookayama Campus, Tokyo Tech
    The curriculum is scheduled to start in FY2020. The 2nd Orientation will be held with more information for guiding students who plan to join the program.
